title: NCLAT dismisses Hinduja Leyland Finance plea for insolvency proceedings against Fly Express - Economic Times
content: NCLAT dismisses Hinduja Leyland Finance plea for insolvency proceedings against Fly Express  Economic Times
description: A three-member bench of the appellate tribunal upheld the earlier orders of the Allahabad bench of the NCLT, which had on April 5, 2022, rejected the plea of Hinduja Leyland Finance.
